ea2e8598-c9f9-4555-aedc-285d0fe920dc:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"ea2e8598-c9f9-4555-aedc-285d0fe920dc","title":{"en":"The Villain's Beloved Daughter"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"악당의 소중한 따님"},{"ko-ro":"Akdangi Sojunghan Ttanim"},{"en":"The Villain's Precious Daughter"},{"fr":"La fille chérie du méchant"},{"es":"La hija más querida del villano"},{"es-la":"La preciosa hija del villano"},{"ru":"Драгоценная дочь злодея"},{"th":"บุตรสาวผู้ล้ำค่าของวายร้าย"},{"ja":"悪党公爵の愛娘"},{"mn":"Хорон Санаатны Нандин Охин"},{"zh":"恶棍的宝贝女儿"},{"zh-hk":"惡徒的寶貝女兒"},{"vi":"Đứa Con Gái Quý Giá Của Nhân Vật Phản Diện"},{"vi":"Cô Công Chúa Nhỏ Của Kẻ Phản Diện"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl"],"description":{"en":"My name is Rosaria von Valencia, but I didn't always have this name. According to a book I read, I'm supposed to be murdered in place of the saint, Cordelia, just because I look like her. I decided to run away to avoid ever meeting my future killer, Duke Valencia, but ended up running into him as he was on the brink of death. After I saved him in the hopes of being spared, he adopted me as his daughter! Now that my new dad's spoiling me with love, does this mean I'll get to live until the end?\n\n---\nIt's already unfair that I suffered greatly because I closely resembled the saint, but why did the villain kill me without any mercy at all? No, actually, it said in the book that I was really bound to die. 'My life is already ruined. Of all things, why do I have to be the one to die a ridiculous death?' There's still hope! I haven't met any of the characters yet so I'll just run away! But why did the villain collapse in front of me...?\n\nWith a lot of effort, I barely saved the life of the villain who was on the brink of death. But now he's saying that he wanted to adopt me as his daughter and raise me to be a saint?! Just like that, I decided to become his daughter for a few days before leaving quietly.\n\n\"My daughter is a genius. There's no child who is more angelic in this world other than my daughter.\"\n\n...I think I have coaxed my dad too well. Even the guys who originally followed the real saint started to pay attention to me. What went wrong? Aren't you guys supposed to hate me?!\n\n---\n**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55069889), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8231327), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3885006486)\n\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/59664271)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-villains-beloved-daughter/info)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%83%A1%E5%BE%92%E7%9A%84%E5%AF%B6%E8%B2%9D%E5%A5%B3%E5%85%92/336)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Villain%E2%80%99s-Beloved-Daughter/582)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/115994)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B3%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2/392)","es":"Ya es injusto que sufrí mucho porque me parezco mucho a la Santa, pero ¿por qué el villano me mató sin piedad?No, en realidad, decía en el libro que estaba destinado a morir.'Mi vida ya está arruinada. ea300699-3f4e-480e-bea9-62548668ec49:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"ea300699-3f4e-480e-bea9-62548668ec49","title":{"en":"Keiji of The Flowers"},"altTitles":[{"vi":"Bắc Đẩu Du Hiệp"},{"ja-ro":"Hana no Keiji"},{"ja-ro":"Hana no Keiji -Kumo no Kanata ni-"},{"en":"Keiji"},{"it":"Keiji il magnifico"},{"ja":"花の慶次 -雲のかなたに-"}],"lastChapter":"167","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["4a9cc6ec-74d9-4133-bcf4-8ceb7a9c61ab"],"description":{"en":"During the closing years of the civil war period and uneasy reign of Toyotomi Hideyoshi, when men high and low scramble to follow conventional propriety so that they don't attract undue notice (or death) to themselves, there is one very bizarre individual who is known for his legendarily outlandish and wild personality, physical appearance and behavior. This series traces the dramatic adventures of Keiji Maeda from personal conflicts with his adopted Maeda family, brave combat exploits, travels to the capital, and relationships with famous existing figures such as Iyeyasu Tokugawa, Rikyuu the tea master, and Hideyoshi himself, to experiences with the foreign and Japanese Christian faithful."},"links":{"al":"44281","ap":"keiji","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/129816/","kt":"24771","mal":"14281","mu":"2383"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

Communications in 1987 (the first full-fledged business in the United States by a Japanese Manga publisher), MANGA was an 88-page anthology of 10 short stories in both color and black-and-white: An experiment by Masaichi Mukaide, the publication's editor, this may have been too far ahead of its time, in many aspects.\n\nFeatures a stunning roster of authors of that time: such as Hiroshi Hirata, Hiroshi Hirata, and Chika Oya in charge of coloring the illustration indicated.\n\n---\nNotes\n- For detailed ToC, refer to Grand Comics Database page The diary, a true story based on her own life, was originally written in first person. It is about a girl coping with her teenage life along with a degenerative disease. She keeps a diary of not only what she does but how she feels and the hardships she must endure. Initially, the diary's purpose was for Kito to chronicle impressions she had about how the disease was affecting her daily life. As the disease progressed, however, the diary became Kito's outlet for describing the intense personal struggles she underwent in coping, adapting, and ultimately trying to survive her disease. As she notes in one entry, \"I write because writing is evidence that I am still alive.\" \n\n(Source: Вместо величайшей битвы между тремя мирами, которая должна была сокрушить небо и землю, всё превратилось в полный фарс и любовную интрижку.","zh":"上古一战后，势弱的魔族复活远古魔尊东方青苍，本以为魔尊会带领魔界反攻天界成就一番霸业，没曾想因为一名菜鸟仙女的介入，霸气魔尊与微末小仙互换身体。自此，一场本该波澜壮阔、毁天灭地的三界之战，变成了一段啼笑皆非，三家哗然的旷世情缘。"},"links":{"al":"152473","mu":"kmszw2i","nu":"demon-kingthe-parting-of-the-orchid-and-cang","raw":"https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1tl3sxemt6d.html"},"originalLanguage":"zh","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"2bd2e8d0-f146-434a-9b51-fc9ff2c5fe6a","name":{"en":"Genderswap"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"acc803a4-c95a-4c22-86fc-eb6b582d82a2","name":{"en":"Wuxia"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

While trying to figure out how to pay off their debts, she found a leaflet from the duke looking for a lost child. The reward is so much money that she could play and eat even after she payed off her debts! Following the memories of reading this book, right away, Lizelle picked up the boy who was caught in a trash dump in a poor village. She took the lost Lapel and went to the duke.\n\n\"This is the child the Duke is looking for.\"\n\nDuke Chester said, looking at me with a doubtful glaze, \"I need confirmation, so you should stay with my nephew in this house for the time being.\"\n\nThe strange cohabitation of the three people started like that. However, Lapel keeps thinking of her as a mother and won't let her leave.\n\n\"Let's get married.\"\n\nLizelle was startled by the unexpected words, \"Are you insane? Did you drink?\"\n\n\"One year. If you perform a contract marriage for one year, I will pay you ten times the amount of the rewards you were given.\"\n\n\"Can I call you 'honey'?\"\n\nAnd the contract marriage and marital life began. But why are his eyes constantly changing? Why do you keep coming every night!\n\n---\nNotorious for her extravagant spending, Wilhazelle Fossier drove her house to complete financial ruin. To pay her family's debt, she resolves to collect a bounty from the wealthy Duke Heillos by finding his missing nephew. Although her search is successful, until the skeptical duke can confirm the young boy's identity, Wilhazelle must spend one month living at the Heillos manor. But when one month turns into one year and a contract marriage, she starts to wonder if the money is worth it!\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55415041), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8734091)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%A0%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EC%83%9D%EA%B2%A8%EB%B2%84%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/2769), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/58578389)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-rewards-of-marriage/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15209)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%92%BF%E5%88%B0%E4%B8%80%E6%A8%81%E5%A5%91%E7%B4%84%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB/351)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Rewards-of-Marriage/586)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95361)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%99/414)","fr":"Sa famille a utilisé tous leurs argents pour des extravagances et du luxe, ce qui a provoqué leur faillite… Alors qu'elle essayait de rembourser leurs dettes, elle trouvât un prospectus du Duc qui recherchait un enfant perdu. La récompense était si généreuse qu'avec ça, ils pourraient vivre confortablement même après avoir remboursé leurs dettes! Suite aux souvenirs de la lecture de ce livre, tout de suite, Lizelle retrouva le garçon qui était coincé dans un pauvre village. Elle le prit donc avec elle, afin de toucher la récompense. «C'est l'enfant que le duc recherche.» Le duc Chester étant dubitatif, il l'obligea à rester avec l'enfant dans sa demeure le temps de prouver que cet enfant est bien le sien. L'étrange cohabitation de ces trois personnes commença alors comme ça…\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55415041), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8734091)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%A0%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EC%83%9D%EA%B2%A8%EB%B2%84%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/2769), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/58578389)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-rewards-of-marriage/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15209)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%92%BF%E5%88%B0%E4%B8%80%E6%A8%81%E5%A5%91%E7%B4%84%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB/351)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Rewards-of-Marriage/586)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95361)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%99/414)","id":"Hobi berfoya-foya Lizelle membuat keluarganya terjerat utang di lintah darah. Sialnya, aku merasuk ke dalam tubuhnya setelah semuanya telanjur kacau! Lalu, aku melihat pengumuman anak hilang beserta imbalannya... Aku tahu siapa dan di mana dia! Raphelion Heillos—si tokoh utama tampan, hebat, dari keluarga Duke, dan yang jelas sekarang dia... masih ada di tempat pembuangan sampah! Aku akan memulangkannya, dapat imbalan, bayar utang, dan hidup makmur sebagai bangsawan! Sayangnya, rencana simpel itu dikacaukan Chester Heillos—paman Raphelion.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55415041), [Naver 왔는데…\n\n“이 아이가 라펠리온이라는 걸 어떻게 확신합니까.”\n\n공작이 나를 사기꾼으로 취급하는 것으로 모자라,\n\n“한 달 동안 이 저택에서 함께 지내시죠.”\n\n당장 사기가 아니라는 증명을 할 수 없으니\n한 달 동안 같이 지내잔다.\n\n그런데!\n\n“결혼하죠.\n 딱 1년 동안만 계약 결혼을 해주면 사례금의 10배를 얹어 주죠.”\n\n이제는 나한테 결혼까지 하잰다.\n\n“여보라고 부르면 될까요?”\n\n일 년 동안만 결혼한다면 사례금의 열배를 준다는데 당연히 승낙해야지!\n그렇게 시작된 일 년 동안의 계약 결혼.\n\n그런데 왜 자꾸 눈빛이 낯뜨겁게 변하는 건데?\n왜 자꾸 밤마다 찾아오는 건데?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** семья жила на широкую руку и в скором времени обанкротились. Пытаясь придумать, как расплатиться с долгами, она нашла листовку от герцога, который искал потерявшегося ребенка. Награда - столько денег, что можно играть и есть даже после выплаты долгов! По воспоминаниям о прочтении этой книги, Лизель сразу же нашла мальчика, деревенской свалке. Она взяла потерянного Лапеля и пошла к герцогу. Так началось странное сожительство трех людей. Однако Лапель продолжает думать обо мне как о матери и не хочет ее оставлять. \"Давай поженимся\". Лизель была поражена неожиданными словами. \"Ты с ума сошел? Ты пил?\" \"1 год. Если ты заключишь контрактный брак на один год, я заплачу тебе 10-кратную сумму вознаграждения\". Так начался брак по контракту и супружеская жизнь. Но почему мои глаза постоянно меняются? Почему ты продолжаешь приходить каждую ночь!\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55415041), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8734091)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%A0%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EC%83%9D%EA%B2%A8%EB%B2%84%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/2769), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/58578389)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-rewards-of-marriage/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15209)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%92%BF%E5%88%B0%E4%B8%80%E6%A8%81%E5%A5%91%E7%B4%84%E5%A9%9A%E5%A7%BB/351)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Rewards-of-Marriage/586)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95361)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%99/414)","uk":"Сім'я Лізель звикла жити на широку руку і незабаром збанкрутували. Намагаючись придумати, як розплатитися з боргами, вона знаходить листівку від герцога, що шукав втрачену дитину. Нагорода - стільки грошей, що можна знову поживати навіть після виплати боргів! За спогадами із прочитаної книги Лізель одразу ж знаходить хлопчика на сільському звалищі. Однак знайдений, Лапель, продовжує думати про неї як про матір і не хоче розлучатися.\n\n\"Якщо ти укладеш зі мною фіктивний шлюб на один рік, я заплачу тобі десятиразову суму винагороди\".\n\nТак розпочався шлюб за контрактом та подружнє життя. Але з чого раптом такі зміни? ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%99/414)","zh-hk":"‘虛榮心滿滿的韋爾阿澤爾·普羅西耶’，這是我的別名。準確來說，這是我穿越之前，韋爾阿澤爾的別名。\n為了替韋爾阿澤爾還債，我千方百計尋找掙錢的辦法！這時我發現了公爵家尋找丟失的孩子的告示。\n而高額的報酬足夠將債務還清。撿到原作中的男主後本想帶到公爵家…“你怎麼就確信這孩子是拉菲利翁。”\n公爵不僅把我當成騙子，還對我說“你就在這裡住一個月吧。”無法立刻證明我不是個騙子，我只好同意了。\n可是！ “我們結婚吧。只要和我契約結婚一年，我就給你十倍報酬。”現在他竟然讓我和他結婚。\n“我可以叫你老婆嗎？”他說過只要結婚一年，就會給我十倍報酬，我當然沒法拒絕啊。\n就這樣我們開始了為期一年的契約婚姻。可是為什麼感覺他的目光變得灼熱？為什麼總是夜裡來找我？\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** Naoto meets Kou after a crappy day in which he misses his school entrance ceremony, loses his job, and then it turns out his hot water at home is shut off for a while. So he has to go to the bathhouse Kou works at. Initially Kou looks young, gentle and beautiful, but soon enough Naoto learns Kou's true nature – he's brash and quick to anger, much older than his appearance hints at and not nearly so naive (at least, not in the way he appears). But his body is nonetheless small and so Naoto doesn't want Kou to take up all the bathhouse jobs on his own. Thus, Naoto starts working for the bathhouse when he can. Besides, even though Kou isn't who Naoto initially expected him to be, Naoto can't help but still be intrigued by the small man."},"links":{"al":"66335","ap":"yukemuri-journey","kt":"14368","mal":"36335","mu":"59742"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

eb32e78d-3a38-47f1-935a-3007c17e8d43:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"eb32e78d-3a38-47f1-935a-3007c17e8d43","title":{"en":"Ashita no Familia"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Ashita's Familia"},{"en":"Tomorrow Familia"},{"en":"ครอบครัวคนเฮี้ยน"},{"en":"あしたのファミリア"},{"en":"我的房客不是人"},{"en":"내일의 패밀리어"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Tachimori Ashita inherited the Tachimori Mansion when his parents died in an accident. Originally owned by his great grandfather, the estate has been traditionally an inn that had many people living in it but, as of lately, it has become vacant due to Ashita losing his parents. As Ashita tries to revive the mansion in remembrance of his parents, he is surprised by a young girl looking vampire named Noi and her servant Sesera who claims to own the place.  \n  \nAccording to Noi, she lent the mansion to Ashita’s great grandfather in return for maintaining the building until Noi returns. He makes friends with both Joseph, a man who works at a second-hand shop , and the young Frederic Chopin. However, Lune had died two months prior of pneumonia. What is Lune's true nature, and how will he affect the two other men?\n\nIn addition to the above (serialized in Weekly Shocomi,  1975/10/05-10/26), also includes:\n- **The Curtains Are Also Blue Tonight** (カーテンは今夜も青い, Curtain wa Konya mo Aoi); Shojo, New Year's Special Issue 1958/01 - Chitori, a young theater actress, has a deep fear of the color red. The color red keeps appearing before her, and it seems to be set deliberately - who is after her, and why does she fear red so much?\n- **The Merchant of Venice** (ベニスの商人, Venice no Shounin); Middle School First Year Course Supplement 1959/04 - Tezuka adapts Shakespeare's famous comedy with a modern flavor and even more humor.\n- **Peacock Shell** (孔雀貝, Kujakugai); Shojo Club Supplement, 06/58 - A young architect washes up on a certain island that has closed itself off from the rest of the world. He falls in love with Lima, the princess of the island, as he finds himself involved in its affairs. This all intertwines with the legend surrounding four rocks near the island - a peacock-colored shell is underwater near one of them, and should it be found, love will be secured....\n- **Song of the White Peacock** (白くじゃくの歌, Shiro Kujaku no Uta); Nakayoshi Summer Vacation Issue 1959/09/15 - Yuri Ogawa never knew what happened to her father, who went missing during the war. However, one day, she and her mother are introduced to a white peacock that he kept on the battlefield. Yuri wants to be a pianist, and she and her peacock become big stars...\n\n---\n**Volume 87 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**","pt-br":"(amazon.br)\n\nA época é século 19 e a Rússia pretendia invadir a Polônia! Thrown into this new life as Russian heiress, Tatiana Yuryevna Belchenova, there is one thing that's still familiar, the piano. But, with Tatiana's body refusing to cooperate with Siyoon's mind, will he manage to make it to the top this time? To make matters worse, he's surrounded by some surprisingly tough competition and they're all still just teenagers! Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… \n\n\"Why in the world can't you do this!?\"\n\n \"Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?\"\n\nThere was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!\n\n\"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead.\"\n\nAnd thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?\n\n---\nRinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5224841), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8391174)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8443269), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794421)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/charming-the-duke-of-the-north/list?title_no=4637)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/youhuobeibugongjue/list?title_no=2198)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/charming-the-duke-of-the-north/list?title_no=4815)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/seduire-le-duc-du-nord/list?title_no=4564)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/charming-the-duke-of-the-north/list?title_no=4632)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002331)","fr":"«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»\n\nSelena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...\n\n«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»\n\n«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»\n\nIl y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!\n\n«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»\n\nEt c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?\n\n---\nSelena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5224841), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8391174)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8443269), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794421)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/charming-the-duke-of-the-north/list?title_no=4637)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/youhuobeibugongjue/list?title_no=2198)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/charming-the-duke-of-the-north/list?title_no=4815)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/seduire-le-duc-du-nord/list?title_no=4564)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/charming-the-duke-of-the-north/list?title_no=4632)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0002331)","id":"Duke si raja dingin tiba-tiba dihadapkan dengan Rinha, aktris top dari dunia lain. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.\nKalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.\nNhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.\nPhải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** House Targael, whose name was respectable, was doomed. They weren’t just doomed, they were destroyed. Just to make ends meet, Elze hides her identity and goes to war. After returning home, Elze, who made a name for herself through her amazing swordsmanship and gained a fortune, thought that all she had to do was live a happy life. Unexpectedly, a political marriage was arranged by the Emperor’s orders! Her partner to be was Shan Kiraxus, deputy commander of the Imperial Army, whom she had saved in the war…\n\n---\nAfter my family fell on hard times, I, Hergenes Targael, disguised myself as a male mercenary named Herge to make money. Along the way, I rescued and met Shaun Kyroxus, a formidable ally who I abruptly left when I was needed back home. Sometime later, I am now part of an arranged marriage with none other than... Shaun?! He's dying to see Herge again, and it's only a matter of time before he finds out! I'm not sure if this marriage will work out, and what do I do when he finds out?!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A9%94%EB%A6%AC%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%A4-%EC%86%8C%EB%93%9C/2883), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58522832)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/marriage-and-sword)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97866)","es":"La Casa Targael, la espada del Emperador y la gloria del Imperio. ec30192e-87df-47da-bfda-cc9a282bc51c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"ec30192e-87df-47da-bfda-cc9a282bc51c","title":{"en":"Futari Solo Camp"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Solo Camping for Two"},{"ja":"ふたりソロキャンプ"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","ru","es-la","pt-br"],"description":{"en":"Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. Thus Gen and Shizuku's days of solo camping together begin.\n\n**Note**: \"Part 1\" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.\n\nThe series resumed its publication in December 2023.","es":"A Kinokura Gen le encanta acampar solo. Disfruta de la tranquila soledad lejos del ajetreo de la ciudad, y de ser capaz de apreciar la naturaleza por sí mismo. Pero en un viaje de campamento, su soledad se ve interrumpida por la aparición de Kusano Shizuku, una joven que quería ir sola a acampar, pero está mal preparada y completamente fuera de su alcance. Mientras él intenta que ella regrese a casa para poder acampar en paz, ella se niega, y tercamente insiste en acompañarlo en futuros viajes de campamento hasta que esté lista para acampar sola. دعنا نرفع تمرد الأخ مرة واحدة! “لقد أنهت حياتها بشكل غير عادل مع الملعقة الترابية التي تمثل كوريا ، لكنها في المرة الثانية ابنة أحد الأغنياء! وهي أيضًا وريثة لعائلة سيرجيو التي هيمنت على الجنوب! إنه وريث نهاية اليوم! بدأت رحلة العروس والعريس هكذا. من الأفضل أن تكون شابًا وقادرًا ووسيمًا! يتطلب الأمر شيئًا واحدًا ، لكن … … ماذا عن ذلك. نظرًا لأنه عقد زواج على أي حال ، فلا توجد طريقة لتأكيد “شيء من هذا القبيل”. “أوه ، لقد قلت أنه لن يحدث.” … ماذا؟ “” هذا كل شيء. هذا كل ما في الأمر! “هذا ما كنا نستغرق في الموت الليلة الماضية. نظرت أديل إليه باستياء ، ولم تلعق شفتيها. قد يكون الأمر محرجًا أمام قائد فارس نبيل مثل التمثال ، لكنني تعلمت بالفعل في أعماق عظامي أن هذا الرجل هو أيضًا وحش. … هذا كل شيء “. اقترب كيليان بابتسامة لطيفة وحبسها بين ذراعيه. همس صوت فوق كتفي وهمس في أذني. “لم أكن لأقول إنني أعاني من مشكلة”. عقد الزواج\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84-%ED%95%98%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94-%EA%B8%88%EC%88%98%EC%A0%80-%EB%93%A4%EC%96%B4%EA%B0%91%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2526), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57260192)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/here-comes-the-silver-spoon/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%B2%A1%E9%96%A5%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91%E4%BF%9D%E4%BD%8D%E6%88%B0/190)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000512)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000143)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Katakan-Ah-Sendok-Emas-Akan-Masuk/250)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77394)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B0_%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%8B%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87/228)","de":"Ein Mädchen aus einfachen Verhältnissen, das von einem Leben träumt, in dem es schön und wohlhabend ist. Ein klassisches Szenario, sagt ihr? Doch als dieser Wunsch wahr wird, läuft nichts mehr nach Drehbuch. Denn Probleme gibt es immer, mit oder ohne Geld — so einfach, wie man sich das Leben einer Adelstochter vorstellt, ist es bei weitem nicht! Let me increase the tension between parents and their children! Brother, I'm asking for a promotion!\"\n\nAnd so, my miserable life as Korea's number one 'dirt spoon' ended. Round two, and I'm back as the daughter of a chaebol! Moreover, I'm also the heir to the Sergio family, who's gained complete control of the South! Although there are some downsides being the sister of a villain, in the end, does it even matter? After all, I'm still fated to inherit the family at the end of the day! But things take a turn for worse, and my life goal to reach the top is jeopardized by my back-stabbing little sister. There's two weeks until my father returns. During that time, I must somehow bring back the best groom of the empire. And that's how the bridegroom expedition started. If you're young, capable, and handsome, even better! Although it'll take a little while... whatever. It's a contract marriage anyway, so there's no way to really confirm all those attributes.\n\n---\nAdelaide looks at him resentfully, not licking her lips. It may have be embarrassing in front of the statue-like Commander of Knights, but she's already learned from the depths of her bones that this man is also a beast.\n\n\"Ah... that's it,\" Killian approaches her with a charming smile and locks her in his arms.\n\nA voice whispers against her shoulder and into her ear, \"You never said you had a problem with this.\"\n\n---\nAdelaide Sergio never knew luxury until she was reborn as a wealthy count’s daughter. She was set to inherit the family estate, but her scheming sister’s sudden engagement has thrown everything off. With just two weeks to find a husband, Adele turns to the temple in search of a holy knight, only to find that their commander is the perfect man! He’s handsome, respectable… and completely uninterested. Can Adele win over the cold commander in time, or will the silver spoon be yanked from her mouth?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84-%ED%95%98%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94-%EA%B8%88%EC%88%98%EC%A0%80-%EB%93%A4%EC%96%B4%EA%B0%91%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2526), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57260192)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/here-comes-the-silver-spoon/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%B2%A1%E9%96%A5%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91%E4%BF%9D%E4%BD%8D%E6%88%B0/190)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000512)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000143)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Katakan-Ah-Sendok-Emas-Akan-Masuk/250)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77394)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B0_%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%8B%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87/228)","fr":"Réincarnée dans un roman, elle devient la fille du grand comte Sergio. Hélas, tout n’est pas rose lorsque l’on a une sœur qui est à la fois une peste et l’héroïne de l’histoire. Surtout quand cette dernière a décidé de se marier. Et comme elle le sait, mariage rime avec héritage dans sa famille, et il se pourrait bien que la succession lui passe sous le nez! Une seule solution: trouver un mari à son tour…\n\n---\nMe réveiller en tant qu'Adelaide Sergio, riche héritière de la partie sud du continent était déjà assez troublant jusqu'à ce que j'apprenne que ma petite sœur à l'apparence angélique et adorable est une véritable manipulatrice sans scrupule, derrière son apparence frêle elle me vole mon fiancé et tente de prendre ma place en tant qu'héritière de la famille. Il faut que je réagisse! Et pour ce fait, j'ai besoin que quelqu'un soit de mon côté...\n\nEt pourquoi pas cet incroyable chevalier à l'air froid?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84-%ED%95%98%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94-%EA%B8%88%EC%88%98%EC%A0%80-%EB%93%A4%EC%96%B4%EA%B0%91%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2526), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57260192)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/here-comes-the-silver-spoon/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%B2%A1%E9%96%A5%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91%E4%BF%9D%E4%BD%8D%E6%88%B0/190)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000512)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000143)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Katakan-Ah-Sendok-Emas-Akan-Masuk/250)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77394)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B0_%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%8B%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87/228)","pt":"\"Eu quero ter uma grande luta de propriedade, não apenas uma pequena luta como acompanhamento! Irmão, vamos levantar!\" Embora sua vida injusta tenha acabado tão cedo, uma colher de terra foi representada como ela. No segundo round de sua vida, ela se tornou filha de uma grande familia! Ela sucedeu ao grande magnata da Família Sergio, que tinha controle total sobre o sul! Embora sempre houvesse a desvantagem de ser a irmã mais velha da vilã no final, por que isso importa? Afinal, sempre serei a sucessora! No entanto, minha irmã não aguentou e me apunhalou pelas costas. Meu objetivo de ser a herdeira estava comprometido. Duas semanas antes do retorno de meu pai, devo de alguma forma encontrar o melhor noivo do império.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84-%ED%95%98%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94-%EA%B8%88%EC%88%98%EC%A0%80-%EB%93%A4%EC%96%B4%EA%B0%91%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2526), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57260192)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/here-comes-the-silver-spoon/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%B2%A1%E9%96%A5%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91%E4%BF%9D%E4%BD%8D%E6%88%B0/190)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000512)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000143)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Katakan-Ah-Sendok-Emas-Akan-Masuk/250)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77394)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B0_%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%8B%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87/228)","ru":"Аделаида Серджио никогда не знала роскоши, пока не переродилась дочерью богатого графа. Она была нацелена на получение семейного наследства, но внезапная помолвка её коварной сестры разрушила все её планы. Имея всего две недели на то, чтобы найти мужа, Адель отправилась на поиски в священный храм и среди священных рыцарей обнаружила, что их командир - идеальный мужчина! Он красив, порядочен... и совершенно не заинтересован в помолвке. \nУправится ли Адель с холодным командиром вовремя, или золотая ложка будет выдернута из её рта?\n\n---\nЯ хочу сражаться за наследство, а не получать подачки с барского плеча! Нужно накалить отношения между родителями и их детьми.\n\n— Брат, я прошу повышения.\n\nИ таким образом, моя жизнь нищенки номер один во всей Корее подошла к концу. Во второй главе своей жизни я родилась дочерью магната! К тому же, я наследница рода Серджио, властвующего над всем Югом! Хотя быть сестрой злодейки достаточно хлопотно, но разве это важно? В конце концов, я должна была унаследовать титул. Но всё пошло наперекосяк, когда моя младшая сестра воткнула мне нож в спину, чтобы расстроить мои планы.\n\nОсталось две недели до возвращения отца. За это время мне нужно как-то выйти за лучшего мужчину в империи! И вот так начались поиски подходящей партии. Если ты молод, способен и привлекателен, то так даже лучше! Хотя поиски займут некоторое время… ну и пусть. В любом случае это брак по контракту, так что кандидату и не обязательно соответствовать всем критериям!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time, she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. C’est pourquoi, quand ce but est finalement atteint mais qu’elle se retrouve trahie, mutilée et enchaînée en punition pour ses crimes, son ressentiment n’en est que plus grand. Sauvée par le Grand Duc Cedric Ebron, elle décide alors d’utiliser la magie pour aider ce dernier à détrôner l’empereur cruel qu’est devenu son frère. To avoid this tragedy, I have decided to persuade the emperor to finally show some kindness to my half-brother, and to gain the sympathy of my brother's loyal knight. Like the hunter who couldn't kill Snow White but rather helped her escape. That's how I thought I would gain his sympathy, but...\n\n\"Hey, could you meet my eyes when we talk?\"\n\n\"...Wouldn't you find that uncomfortable?\"\n\n\"It isn't uncomfortable. Your eyes are as pretty as a camellia.\"\n\nHow come I'm the one who's pitying you?\n\n===\n\n\"If I ever come back... At that time, would you please allow me to stay by your side?\"\n \nIt was only when I was on the brink of tears, with a lump in my throat was I able to realize it. What these feelings were. The reason I think of you from time to time, miss the memories we made together, wish so earnestly for your happiness, and why you've become so precious to me.
